attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that our current government is willfully ignoring public opinion on several major issues in the UK. How much longer must the honest law abiding public put up with ever increasing taxation along with being made to feel like we are the minority in our country. Come on PM treat us fairly, especially us married, white hetrosexual people, who have worked all their lifes and paid their taxes.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
